title: Cattle country
brief_description: This film provides information on the beef cattle industry in Australia. It presents a general picture of beef cattle types, including the major British breeds, some tropical breeds, and the European exotics, now making their appearance in the country. Intended in particular for students and young farmers. No further credits available.
